text.en: Good morning Sir Gideon.
You are late Cassian, I shouldn't let you sleep at all if you keep doing this.
Sorry Gideon.
Say that not to me. The training ahead shall teach you regret well enough.
And it's Sir Gideon, not just Gideon. That's S-I-R, Gideon! Sir Gideon, mind you!
Yes Sir Gideon.
- Stay silent -
Say it !
Yes Sir Gideon.
No, I won't satisfy your narcissist ego.
Good, now lets review the basics.
One moment, could you please speak to the chef? He did not cook for us, again.
Ok
Then face me and feel defeat you filthy kid.
Everything is set on my end. Come back when you are ready for the audience, and don't be late, or you will find out what real torture feels like.
- Leave -
Audience... ?
I'll wait here then.
Don't go forgetting the basics! Knowing how to fight is one thing, but it's the ones who have mastered the simple stuff that rise above as elite soldiers.
Is this some kind of your unpleasant jokes?
Not at all...
Oh my goodness. It's because of people like you that I will stay here working forever.
Well, listen. Today you do have an audience with the emperor Charles II, the man leading the whole Zalium empire and his son, the prince Artis.
Understood?
Yes Sir Gideon. - Leave -
I still have some questions.
Anything else?
Zalium... Empire?
What about these powerful people, what do they want?
Why it has to be me?
And you? What do you earn from this?
- Leave -
No, thanks, I will be right back.

Did you eat something poisoned? The Zalium empire is the place you live, the place we are standing on right now. It is thanks to the empire that you have been trained by someone like me, if not for that, you might be right now on the streets asking for food.

These "Powerful people" are the ones investing the coins onto the Rogue Squad Project, a project founded to replace their previous Royal Guard. They need elite soldiers, people like me or maybe you, in a very far future it seems.

If it was for me I would have placed your comrade Zeryn, she is much more capable than you right now, maybe the only trainee I am proud of. But you know, we cannot place a woman in such a position of power and you are the second best trainee in the Rogue Squadron Project.

If all of this goes as expected, you will become the leader of the Royal Guard and you will be tasked with the next step of the Rogue Squadron Project, which will involve training new generations of elite soldiers so every formation of soldiers in the empire has one of such soldiers as a  captain.
But do not get any ilusion, at the pace this is going, you might die from old before any of that happens.

Well, If you are considered "capable" of becoming someone able to uphold a position such as mine right now as well as being the leader of the next Royal Guard in a near future, I will be able to retire in peace.
Are you ready now kiddo?
I am.
Not yet - Leave -
I'm back.
Are you ready?
Yes sir !
- Leave -
When does it start ?
Look behind, they are just entering the arena.
THE EMPEROR IS ENTERING THE TRAINING ARENA !
Emperor Charles II, the one who's leading Zalium to a bright future ! And Artis, heir to the throne, our prince. Please, feel welcome!
Not yet.
Thanks, but there is no need for such flattery today. We aim to see the progress you have been making lately Gideon.

Gideon, we planned you to spar with your best trainee in order to observe how the project is going. If you don't mind, I would like you to step out for this one. I want to test your trainee with a guard from Dunhaven, our  capital.
Of course, I assure you won't be disappointed, emperor.
Then let it begin! Come here Cassian !
Yes sir.
Fast ! Come here !
Well, hear me, the soldiers from the capital are mosly low nobles that do a little service as generals only to gain recognition, and they are also trained by nobles with no real experience.
Their fancy style looks sharp and hits hard, sure, but once you knock them out of it, they are helpless. Throw him off, and the fight is as good as won.
Understood.
Now, go and kick that fancy guard's ass.
What are you doing here? Go!
I will not, you deserve it for being late, you either go by yourself or start training.
I'll go ask him
Lets start training.
Good.
Go! And quick!
Good
Im sorry Sir Gideon.
You still need a bit of improvement.
Still, it can be enough. Come back to me if you still need more training. Also check this sword, might be useful that you have it during the audience.
I hope it will be enough.  Come back to me if you still want more training. Also check this sword, might be useful that you have it during the audience.
Hmmm...
Interesting.
Interesting what? You bald man cannot teach anything more to me.
You better be, come to see me later. We will begin training so you can be a bit less dumb.
If you think so...  Come later and we will start practice.
Remember to choose your action properly, do not only plan on the present, but also in the future. What can seem a good move now, can be your worst error in the blink of an eye.
Do you want to practice?
That's enough training, I'm ready now.
Yes, any last teaching I must know?
- Leave -
That will come, in time. Once you have pushed your style to its limits, you will be forced to learn from elsewhere. So your idea of mastery grows, and you with it.
Now lets begin.
Do any preparations before the audience starts. It will take place just here, in our training grounds.
Yes Sir Gideon.
No, I won't satisfy your narcissist ego.
One moment, could you please speak to the chef? He did not cook for us, again.
Ok
- Leave -
Audience... ?
I'll wait here then.
I'll go ask him
Lets start training.
